text: The Fate of the Furious: Original Motion Picture Score is the original film score album of the 2017 action film of the same name. It was released by the Universal Music Group on April 28, 2017. The score was written and composed by Brian Tyler, who also wrote and composed the musical score for the third, fourth, fifth and seventh installments. == Track listing == All music composed by Brian Tyler. == Certifications == == References == == External links == The Fate of the Furious (score) on The Fast and the Furious Wiki Category:2017 soundtrack albums Category:Fast & Furious albums Category:Brian Tyler soundtracks Category:Back Lot Music soundtracks Category:Action film soundtracks
title: The Fate of the Furious (score)
